text:
This is Pastor Sam Adeyemi of Daystar speaking about the recent 5G controversy and Coronavirus.

NO silly conspiracies.
NO baseless claims.
NO ignorant assertions.

The man drew simple lessons from verifiable history to give hope. Now this is an educated and an informed pastor. https://t.co/Y5rTLO14lz
